properties.entry: SELECT A1.ACHIV_TYPE , L1.LOCAL_NAME , P1.POST_NAME , M1.MEMBER_NICKNAME , M1.MEMBER_PROFILE , C1.CATEGORY_NAME FROM TBL_MEMBER M1 JOIN TBL_LOCAL L1 ON (M1.MEMBER_NAME = L1.LOCAL_NAME) JOIN TBL_POST P1 ON (M1.MEMBER_NO = P1.POST_NO) JOIN TBL_ACHIEVEMENT A1 ON (M1.MEM_CHARCTER_CODE = A1.ACHIV_CODE) JOIN TBL_CATEGORY C1 ON (C1.CATEGORY_NAME = M1.MEMBER_NAME)

SELECT A1.ACHIV_TYPE , L1.LOCAL_NAME , P1.POST_NAME , M1.MEMBER_NICKNAME , M1.MEMBER_PROFILE , C1.CATEGORY_NAME FROM TBL_MEMBER M1. JOIN TBL_POST M1 ON (M1.MEMBER_NO = P1.POST_MEMBER_NO) JOIN TBL_LOCAL L1 ON (P1.LOCAL_CODE = L1.LOCAL_CODE )
